architectureStyle.description: Heavy industrial hunter architecture - utilitarian structures built for the hunt. Massive trophy halls, prey processing facilities, and hunt coordination centers. Buildings look like converted industrial complexes modified for hunting operations.
keyElements: Trophy display halls with mounted prey
architectureStyle.colors: Olive green, dark brown, gray metallic, bronze accents, yellow/amber lighting
architectureStyle.materials: Heavy industrial metal, reinforced plating, trophy bones and hides, sensor equipment

buildings.name: Alpha's Lodge
buildings.description: Command center for the pack Alpha. Massive trophy hall displaying the greatest kills. Hunt strategy planning. Pack hierarchy enforcement.

buildings.name: Trophy Hall
buildings.description: Central display of pack hunting achievements. Mounted prey from across the quadrant. Ritual gathering place for hunt celebrations.

buildings.name: Hunt Command Center
buildings.description: Tactical coordination for pack hunts. Sensor data processing. Prey tracking and pursuit planning. Communication hub.

buildings.name: Weapons Forge
buildings.description: Manufacturing facility for tetryon weapons and hunting blades. Customization of personal armaments. Trophy weapon crafting.

buildings.name: Training Arena
buildings.description: Combat training facility for young hunters. Simulated prey encounters. Weapon proficiency drills. Beta selection trials.

buildings.name: Armory
buildings.description: Storage for hunting weapons, armor, and capture equipment. Maintenance and repair. Gear distribution before hunts.

buildings.name: Sensor Array
buildings.description: Long-range prey detection and tracking. Analysis of prey species weaknesses. Hunt planning intelligence gathering.

buildings.name: Prey Analysis Lab
buildings.description: Study of captured prey specimens. Weakness identification. Trophy preservation techniques. Hunting strategy development.

buildings.name: Tracking Station
buildings.description: Monitoring of prey movements across sectors. Hunt coordination with other packs. Relay communication hub.

buildings.name: Ship Hangar
buildings.description: Construction and maintenance of hunting vessels. Ship modification for specific prey types. Fleet readiness facility.

buildings.name: Equipment Fabricator
buildings.description: Manufacturing of hunting gear, traps, and capture devices. Customization of equipment for specific hunts.

buildings.name: Armor Workshop
buildings.description: Crafting and repair of hunter armor. Trophy integration into personal gear. Alpha armor ceremonial crafting.

buildings.name: Prey Pen
buildings.description: Containment facility for captured prey awaiting processing. Live storage for extended hunts. Feeding and maintenance.

buildings.name: Processing Plant
buildings.description: Prey butchering and food processing. Trophy extraction. Waste recycling. Ration production for hunting parties.

buildings.name: Hunting Grounds
buildings.description: Maintained wilderness area for training hunts and fresh meat acquisition. Stocked with various prey species.

buildings.name: Power Core
buildings.description: Industrial power generation for the settlement. Heavy-duty reactors. Redundant systems for critical hunt operations.

buildings.name: Generator Complex
buildings.description: Secondary power facilities. Sensor array power supply. Emergency backup systems. Industrial capacity.

buildings.name: Ritual Chamber
buildings.description: Sacred space for hunt rituals and prey consecration. Trophy blessing ceremonies. Coming-of-age hunt preparations.

buildings.name: Ancestor Shrine
buildings.description: Memorial to legendary hunters of the past. Greatest trophy displays. Meditation before significant hunts.

buildings.name: Medical Bay
buildings.description: Treatment facility for hunt injuries. Surgery and recovery. Cybernetic enhancement installation. Venom antidotes.

buildings.name: Regeneration Chamber
buildings.description: Advanced healing technology for severe wounds. Hunter restoration between hunts. Battle damage repair.

buildings.name: Training Hall
buildings.description: Education facility for young hunters. Prey species knowledge. Hunting techniques. Pack hierarchy training.

buildings.name: Trophy Archive
buildings.description: Historical records of great hunts. Prey species database. Hunting strategy library. Alpha lineage records.

buildings.name: Trade Post
buildings.description: Exchange facility for hunting supplies and trophies. Inter-pack trading. Equipment procurement from other species.

buildings.name: Trophy Exchange
buildings.description: Marketplace for rare trophies and hunting relics. Status symbol trading. Alpha-quality trophy auctions.

buildings.name: Hunter Barracks
buildings.description: Living quarters for pack hunters. Personal trophy displays. Weapon storage. Rest between hunts.

buildings.name: Alpha Quarters
buildings.description: Luxurious dwelling for the pack Alpha. Extensive trophy collection. Planning chambers. Status display.

buildings.name: Beta Den
buildings.description: Quarters for pack Betas and senior hunters. Mid-tier trophy displays. Pack leadership meetings.

buildings.name: Combat Pit
buildings.description: Arena for honor duels and combat training. Settling pack disputes. Entertainment through controlled combat.

buildings.name: Hunt Simulator
buildings.description: Holographic recreation of famous hunts. Training simulations. Entertainment reviewing past glories.

buildings.name: Comm Relay
buildings.description: Long-range communication with other packs and hunting parties. Hunt coordination across sectors.

buildings.name: Transport Hub
buildings.description: Shuttle landing facility. Prey transport processing. Equipment distribution center.

buildings.name: Intelligence Center
buildings.description: Gathering information on worthy prey. Infiltration planning. Species weakness analysis.

buildings.name: Observation Post
buildings.description: Covert monitoring of potential hunting grounds. Prey population assessment. Hunt timing optimization.

buildings.name: Relic Vault
buildings.description: Storage for the most sacred hunting relics and legendary trophies. Only Alpha access. Pack heritage preservation.

buildings.name: Holographic Arena
buildings.description: Advanced facility for recreating hunts of any prey species. Training for exotic targets. Entertainment center.
